sentences.en: At eight o'clock the ballroom was a blaze of light and guests had begun to assemble.
sentences.cn: 8点钟,舞会厅正灯火辉煌,客人们已开始集合.

sentences.en: Ballet had started to leave the royal ballroom for the stage.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾离开皇家舞厅开始走上剧场舞台.

sentences.en: Dancers wheeled gracefully on the ballroom floor.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈者在舞厅的地板上优雅地旋转.

sentences.en: From the ballroom beneath, muffled and suffocating chords were drifting up on hot waves of air.
sentences.cn: 从下面的舞厅里, 低沉而闷人的乐声随着一阵阵热气飘了上来.

sentences.en: He glanced a trifle apprehensively towards the crowded ballroom.
sentences.cn: 他敏捷地朝挤满了人的舞厅瞟了一眼.

sentences.en: His two mismatched enthusiasms in those days had been debating and ballroom dancing.
sentences.cn: 那时,他有两个极不相称的爱好,一是喜欢辩论,一是爱跳舞.

sentences.en: In Detroit, ironically for me, the celebration took place in the ballroom of the Renaissance Center.
sentences.cn: 在底特律, 对我说来具有讽刺意味的是, 招待会竟在文艺复兴中心的舞厅举行.

sentences.en: Our friends say ballroom dancing is old - fashioned and that it's for old people.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友们说交际舞过时了,老人们才去跳.

sentences.en: Peter McDermott moved into the Grand Ballroom for a better view.
sentences.cn: 彼得·麦克德莫特走进大舞厅以便看得更清楚些.

sentences.en: Several hundred people twirl around the ballroom dance floor.
sentences.cn: 几百人在舞厅的舞池里旋转。

sentences.en: The boss of the ballroom excused them the fee.
These folks clearly take this ballroom thing very seriously.
sentences.cn: 这些家伙显然很拿舞厅这事当回事。

sentences.en: They milled around the ballroom with video cameras.
sentences.cn: 他们扛着摄像机在舞厅里转来转去。

sentences.en: We're ready to shoot ( the ballroom sequence ).
sentences.cn: 我们已经准备好拍摄 ( 舞厅的连续镜头 ).

sentences.en: What a sight she looked among the dancers in the ballroom!
sentences.cn: 她在舞厅里跳舞的人们中间显得多么漂亮啊!

trans.tran_en: a very large room used for dancing on formal occasions
